item.title: Mercy Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b'Heroes never die: http://bit.ly/MeetMercy

A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Dr. Angela Ziegler ("Mercy") is a peerless healer, brilliant scientist, and staunch advocate for peace. Though she spends most of her time caring for the broken and dispossessed in crisis areas around the world, Mercy can be counted on to don her Valkyrie swift-response suit whenever innocents are imperiled.

Mercy is a formidable frontline medic, capable of healing and strengthening her allies, and even resurrecting them when theyve fallen on the battlefield. 

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

item.title: VALE - GRANDMASTER MERCY NERF GAMEPLAY TIPS | How To Improve As Mercy Guide - Overwatch Season 7

meta.summary:
b"----------------------------------------------------------------
JOIN A SCRIM THIS FRIDAY OR SATURDAY HERE : https://www.guilded.gg/matchmaking
----------------------------------------------------------------


Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Mercy video because I think its fun and people just love Mercy it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Mercy player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode guide for overwatch season 7 placement matches and overwatch season 7 changes. Going over some Mercy season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. I hope that these tips can help to have you guys learn how to improve as Mercy and hope this works as a mini Mercy guide tip trick thing for all that want to improve as her. Anyways, thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1zPEngoixrw
Thumbnail: https://orig00.deviantart.net/e699/f/2017/033/9/6/mercy_overwatch_ctiahao_by_ctiahao-daxmpcp.png
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:
-mercy is MUCH worse vs dive/deathball comps now, but not much worse vs slow push comps
-every support player i've ever seen looks at their teammates most played heroes
-Ask teammates to shield you while ressing, you can get your zarya a lot of charge with this strat
-consistantly use and cancel your flying to get barely in range of healing while still moving a lot
-his team kinda gets stomped first point, but on second point he consitantly heals and stays alive
-if your team is doing badly, tell them to all backup adn group, resetting can win games
-try to heal right around corners, make it hard for someone like hanzo to one shot you
-when ulting stay around corners more than just high up in the air, hitscan can wreck you there

-his team got stomped on the first offense, but stomps on their own first offense. Dont think youll do wors
-ask for a pharah if they have a spam comp, dont always fly right next to her or else you may get sniped
-phrarh gives you infinte more mobility, even if she doesnt get a lot of kills she lets you get a lot of healing
-Your ult is extremely importat now vs dive, make sure to tell your team it is up
-if they have no hiscan just try to fly up to where you have the most vision possible
-you can win games off of small consitant pushes, even if you cant get one big push all the time
-damage boosting a nano visor makes soldier broken, if you arent doing anything else then go for it
-if your team is down one in a fight but you think you may win with a res, just go for it, use his hp to get ult
-you can beat soldier ult by hidng around walls and using your super far range healing, problem is genji ult

-on offense you can go for more cheesy resses because you get more chances, dont do this on defense
-winston bubble gives you a safe palce to res
-Sometimes you may pop off but your team just cant finish the kills... just get used to dealing with it

-your damamge boost priotity is soldier than reinhardt (charging rein ult early can mean a won fight)
-You can kidna awkwardly res while falling, this makes it harder for people to kill you
-you can solo heal with sym easily, just damage boost a lot less
-ult at the start of teamfights especially if you are the solo healer, even if you dont use both resses its gud
-if it is safer to heal then res, just heal. And go for the res later




======================================================================







Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully. How GRANDMASTER Players DESTORY with Mercy - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks Overwatch - 20 TricksMercy Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't! Some tips and tricks to master Mercy! Overwatch - 7 OP Tips and Tricks Grandmaster Players use every game! Mercy overwatch, Mercy guide top 500 tips and tricks Mercy master gameplay, how Mercy is played, shadowburn gameplay Mercy overwatch competitive esports vod grandmaster Mercy tricks grandmaster top 500 Mercy, overwatch top 700 Mercy esports vod Mercy esports gameplay, grandmaster Mercy tricks top 500 tricks tips, how to play Mercy, Mercy season 7, overwatch competitive season 7 Mercy, Mercy season 7 offense, Mercy season 7 defense, overwatch season 7 Mercy guide overwatch,Mercy tricks,Tricks Mercy Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't,Tricks Mercy Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't overwatch,overwatch Tricks Mercy Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't,



Title:GRANDMASTER Mercy GAMEPLAY TIPS | How To Improve As Mercy Guide - Overwatch Season 7 Competitive Tricks"
